00028 #ifndef __L4_KDEBUG_H__
00029 #define __L4_KDEBUG_H__
00030 
00031 #include <l4/sys/compiler.h>
00032 
00040 #ifndef __ASSEMBLER__
00041 #define enter_kdebug(text) \
00042 asm(\
00043     "int  $3  \n\t"\
00044     "jmp  1f  \n\t"\
00045     ".ascii \""text "\"\n\t"\
00046     "1:     \n\t"\
00047     )
00048 #else
00049 #define enter_kdebug(text)   \
00050     int $3        ;\
00051     jmp 1f        ;\
00052     .ascii  text  ;\
00053     1:
00054 #endif
00055 
00063 #define asm_enter_kdebug(text) \
00064     "int  $3  \n\t"\
00065     "jmp  1f  \n\t"\
00066     ".ascii \""text "\"\n\t"\
00067     "1:     \n\t"
00068 
00076 #define kd_display(text) \
00077 asm(\
00078     "int  $3  \n\t"\
00079     "nop    \n\t"\
00080     "jmp  1f  \n\t"\
00081     ".ascii \""text "\"\n\t"\
00082     "1:     \n\t"\
00083     )
00084 
00092 #define ko(c)           \
00093   asm(            \
00094       "int  $3  \n\t"     \
00095       "cmpb %0,%%al \n\t"     \
00096       : /* No output */       \
00097       : "N" (c)         \
00098       )
00099

00258 /*****************************************************************************
00259  *** Implementation
00260  *****************************************************************************/
00261 
00262 L4_INLINE void
00263 outchar(char c) L4_NOTHROW
00264 {
00265   asm(
00266       "int  $3  \n\t"
00267       "cmpb $0,%%al \n\t"
00268       : /* No output */
00269       : "a" (c)
00270       );
00271 }
00272 
00273 /* actually outstring is outcstring */
00274 L4_INLINE void
00275 outstring(const char *text) L4_NOTHROW
00276 {
00277   asm volatile (
00278       "int  $3  \n\t"
00279       "cmpb $2,%%al \n\t"
00280       : /* No output */
00281       : "a" (text)
00282       : "memory"
00283       );
00284 }
00285 
00286 /* actually outstring is outcstring */
00287 L4_INLINE void
00288 outnstring(char const *text, unsigned len) L4_NOTHROW
00289 {
00290   asm volatile (
00291       "pushl    %%ebx        \n\t"
00292       "movl     %%ecx, %%ebx \n\t"
00293       "int  $3       \n\t"
00294       "cmpb $1,%%al      \n\t"
00295       "popl     %%ebx        \n\t"
00296       : /* No output */
00297       : "a" (text), "c"(len)
00298       : "memory"
00299       );
00300 }
00301 
00302 L4_INLINE void
00303 outhex32(int number) L4_NOTHROW
00304 {
00305   asm(
00306       "int  $3  \n\t"
00307       "cmpb $5,%%al \n\t"
00308       : /* No output */
00309       : "a" (number)
00310       );
00311 }
00312 
00313 L4_INLINE void
00314 outhex20(int number) L4_NOTHROW
00315 {
00316   asm(
00317       "int  $3  \n\t"
00318       "cmpb $6,%%al \n\t"
00319       : /* No output */
00320       : "a" (number)
00321       );
00322 }
00323 
00324 L4_INLINE void
00325 outhex16(int number) L4_NOTHROW
00326 {
00327   asm(
00328       "int  $3  \n\t"
00329       "cmpb $7, %%al\n\t"
00330       : /* No output */
00331       : "a" (number)
00332       );
00333 }
00334 
00335 L4_INLINE void
00336 outhex12(int number) L4_NOTHROW
00337 {
00338   asm(
00339       "int  $3  \n\t"
00340       "cmpb $8, %%al\n\t"
00341       : /* No output */
00342       : "a" (number)
00343       );
00344 }
00345 
00346 L4_INLINE void
00347 outhex8(int number) L4_NOTHROW
00348 {
00349   asm(
00350       "int  $3  \n\t"
00351       "cmpb $9, %%al\n\t"
00352       : /* No output */
00353       : "a" (number)
00354       );
00355 }
00356 
00357 L4_INLINE void
00358 outdec(int number) L4_NOTHROW
00359 {
00360   asm(
00361       "int  $3  \n\t"
00362       "cmpb $11, %%al\n\t"
00363       : /* No output */
00364       : "a" (number)
00365       );
00366 }
00367 
00368 L4_INLINE char
00369 l4kd_inchar(void) L4_NOTHROW
00370 {
00371   char c;
00372   asm volatile ("int $3; cmpb $13, %%al" : "=a" (c));
00373   return c;
00374 }
00375 
00376 L4_INLINE void
00377 fiasco_profile_start(void) L4_NOTHROW
00378 {
00379   asm("int $3; cmpb $24, %al");
00380 }
00381 
00382 L4_INLINE void
00383 fiasco_profile_stop_and_dump(void) L4_NOTHROW
00384 {
00385   asm("int $3; cmpb $25, %al");
00386 }
00387 
00388 L4_INLINE void
00389 fiasco_profile_stop(void) L4_NOTHROW
00390 {
00391   asm("int $3; cmpb $26, %al");
00392 }
00393 
00394 L4_INLINE void
00395 fiasco_watchdog_enable(void) L4_NOTHROW
00396 {
00397   asm("int $3; cmpb $31, %%al" : : "c" (1));
00398 }
00399 
00400 L4_INLINE void
00401 fiasco_watchdog_disable(void) L4_NOTHROW
00402 {
00403   asm("int $3; cmpb $31, %%al" : : "c" (2));
00404 }
00405 
00406 L4_INLINE void
00407 fiasco_watchdog_takeover(void) L4_NOTHROW
00408 {
00409   asm("int $3; cmpb $31, %%al" : : "c" (3));
00410 }
00411 
00412 L4_INLINE void
00413 fiasco_watchdog_giveback(void) L4_NOTHROW
00414 {
00415   asm("int $3; cmpb $31, %%al" : : "c" (4));
00416 }
00417 
00418 L4_INLINE void
00419 fiasco_watchdog_touch(void) L4_NOTHROW
00420 {
00421   asm("int $3; cmpb $31, %%al" : : "c" (5));
00422 }
00423 
00424 #endif /* __ASSEMBLER__ */

00426 #endif /* __L4_KDEBUG_H__ */
L4Re - L4 Runtime Environment
